[[Monica Geller]] (cousin) }} '''Maureen''' is [[Monica Geller|Monica]] and [[Ross Geller|Ross]]' cousin, who appears briefly in "[[The One With Monica And Chandler's Wedding, Part 1]]". She is introduced to [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] by Monica in the rehearsal dinner. She wears a blue dress. The actress who portrays Maureen is uncredited.
